idea.name: Recipe Remix
idea.problem: Home cooks struggle to adapt recipes for dietary restrictions without losing flavor

unknowns: Recipe parsing accuracy for unstructured formats

competitive.differentiator: AI-powered substitution engine that maintains flavor profile, not just nutritional equivalence

scope.mvp_definition: Paste a recipe URL, select dietary restriction, get adapted recipe with substitution explanations
scope.full_vision: A personal cooking assistant that learns your taste preferences and dietary needs, automatically adapting any recipe you find online

evaluation.reasoning: Strong problem-solution fit with a clear differentiator. Known stack and existing patterns reduce risk. The MVP is tight and achievable in ~6 sessions.
